creators.name: Ian Aragon
creators.description: William Bradley 'Brad' Pitt is an American actor and film producer. He has received a Golden Globe Award, a Screen Actors Guild Award, and three Academy Award nominations in acting categories
creators.children: Shiloh Nouvel Jolie-Pitt, Maddox Chivan Jolie-Pitt

creators.name: Juls Padua Ayon
creators.description: Tom Cruise, is an American film actor and producer. He has been nominated for three Academy Awards and has won three Golden Globe Awards. He started his career at age 19 in the 1981 film Endless Love.
creators.children: Suri Cruise, Isabella Jane Cruise, Connor Cruise

creators.name: Philip Francia
creators.description: John Christopher 'Johnny' Depp II is an American actor, film producer, and musician. He has won the Golden Globe Award and Screen Actors Guild award for Best Actor.
creators.children: Lily-Rose Melody Depp, John 'Jack' Christopher Depp III
